## AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME FOR LANGUAGE TRAINING SERVICES TENDER

**Tender Reference Number:** WS4489474996-Doc4490709943
**Amendment Number:** 9
**Publication Date:** March 15, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** April 26, 2024, 2:00 p.m. EDT

**Background:**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) issues this amended tender for Language Training Services as per the Request for Standing Offer (RSO) notice (WS4489474996). The tender aims to provide language training services to Statistics Canada (StatCan).

**Key Information:**

* The acquisition falls under the category of SRV (Services) and is subject to the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA) and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
* The Region of Delivery is the National Capital Region (NCR).
* The tender will be evaluated based on the combination of technical merit and price.

**Submission Requirements:**

* All necessary documentation and responses must be submitted by 2:00 p.m. EDT on April 26, 2024.
* Submissions received after the specified closing time will be declared non-responsive.

**Contact Information:**

* For any queries or concerns regarding the tender, please contact Christophe Hakizimana (SPAC/PSPC) at christophe.hakizimana@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Notice URL:**
